Appellate court reversed; circuit courts affirmed.
MR. JUSTICE GOLDENHERSH delivered the opinion of the court:
Defendant Norman L. Gilmore (Docket No. 47691) pleaded guilty in the circuit court of Grundy County to four counts of an information charging burglary and three counts charging forgery and was sentenced to the penitentiary.
